Articles.Content: 635. I WANT MONORAIL SYSTEM BETWEEN BUILDINGS AT THE KSC FOR MY KERBALS. plz?
Please fix it so my rocket doesn't just go round and round in circles when I reach orbit.
636. A full cloth simulation for parachutes. And Kerbals attempting to re-pack them should have a risk of getting entangled and rolling around wrapped in cloth looking like deranged beach balls.

<< Didn't have the patience to wade through all 61 pages, apologies if already mentioned >>

637. Black Holes

638. Terraforming

639. There is no "I win" button that gives me all the science, infinite money and resources and locks career mode so I can only play sandbox

640. Physics is all wrong. After seeing "Gravity" I now know I can line of site drive everywhere I need to go

636. A full cloth simulation for parachutes. And Kerbals attempting to re-pack them should have a risk of getting entangled and rolling around wrapped in cloth looking like deranged beach balls.

I'd pay to see that XD
637: Make me planets has perfect flat orbitz plzzzz
10: We want multiplayer! can no longer be considered part of this list, due to the release of the KMP mod.

638(!): Maek the jetpaks wurk pruperly un kerbin plz

(I do know how to spell, FYI )
639. Make it so we can turn Kerbals into fuel!

639. Make it so we can turn Kerbals into fuel!

Kethane mod? It has a machine that turns kerBals into fuel.

Kethane mod? It has a machine that turns kerBals into fuel.

I know, but its kethane, not stock fuel

I know, but its kethane, not stock fuel

Kerbals to fuel? Green energy!

Soylent Kerbal?

I want to be able to build linear accelerators and large inflatable dome bases.

635. I WANT MONORAIL SYSTEM BETWEEN BUILDINGS AT THE KSC FOR MY KERBALS. plz?

Patience! Give it a few months, and there may be a mod that will let you do that..

640: Round planets are soooo boing, everyone has them, We need Kerbin replacing with the Discworld, and KSP can now stand for Krull Space Program. Kerbal scientists will be replaced with wizards and astronauts with Chellonaughts. We will gain science magic points for discovering the sex of the turtle.

Krakens will be replaced with Luggages.
641 Rocket powered skateboards. I need them as an alternative to getting my Kerbals into orbit.

642: Beer and wine for kerbals: they might smuggle it in the spaceship and go crazy.

643: Crazy Kerbals: They start destroying the ship until they become UN-crazy, which requires a doctor. crazyness is caused by beer/wine, eva for too long, solitude for too long and no entertainment for too long.

644: Doctor kerbals: They take up 2 kerbal spaces, can't EVA, and take up 2000 medicalStuff a second

645: medicalStuff: used by doctors. the largest container (the size of an orange tank) is 20 tons and holds 50k medical stuff.

646: Entertainment: Weighs 10 tons for a large, weighs 1 ton for a small, the small only works for 1, the large works for 20. there is also a mobile entertainment module in the R&D that cost 1,000,000,000 (billion) dollars and 1,000,000 (million) science... and removes the need for other entertainment.

this may seem logical, but look at it closely.

Edited November 4, 2013 by Firenexus13
647 Forget stupid ideas.
648: ship engines powered by Jebs awesomeness which allow for infinite fuel!1!1!1!1!!!1!1

649 Redesign the KSP engine so we can launch real world rockets with it, with one free rocket with each copy of KSP.

Then make other rockets available as a dlc.

10 We need multiplayer!

There is a multiplayer mod for KSP, it's called KMP. You should check it out.

There is a multiplayer mod for KSP, it's called KMP. You should check it out.

No, KMP was not out yet back then.

No, KMP was not out yet back then.

Reading the first few post make me feel like a time traveller.

74: My spaceships keep going after I shut the engines off. It's unrealistc. Could somebody PLEASE fix that?

somebody actually said that...? they should go read about spaceflight for a few hours, then sit in the corner and think about what they said

Edited November 4, 2013 by joethebeast22
done goofed

Did anyone ever play "Frontier: Elite II"?

It had an entire galaxy of hundreds of systems and it came on two floppy disks.

Can we import the galaxy generation system from that and have it in KSP? Along with several hundred more anomalies, biomes, experiments, not to mention tons of different environment types.

No?

Ooh, and maybe pirates? Random ships that attempt to rendezvous with you in space and you have to get away?

Honestly it was the best game ever to come in at less than 3Mb.

somebody actually said that...? they should go read about spaceflight for a few hours, then sit in the corner and think about what they said

I thiiiink that may have been a joke...
